text: “we did fix it. that’s why it no longer works on IE7”

Ok so i just checked on my grandparents pc and turns out there’s an issue on ie6 too, I’m not asking for much.. should take you less than an hour, right? oh and can we also make it 50% larger? yeah, one more thing… I know you’re half way through integrating it into HubSpot but turns we might want to use salesforce instead because charlies brothers brother who has nothing to do with anything remotely web oriented says it is good, can we do that and still hit the deadline tomorrow?
do as marilyn does and drink :wink:
